expo.name: SprintLoop
expo.description: Transform your study sessions with SprintLoop - the app that combines focused sprints with intelligent summaries and AI-powered quizzes. Join study circles, track streaks, and accelerate your learning with friends.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: SprintLoop needs camera access to capture study materials and share progress with your study circles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SprintLoop needs photo library access to select images for your study sessions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SprintLoop needs microphone access for video recording during study sessions.
